name: Spy Scape
description:
You are a spy working for a secret agency of the British government, after years you were finally in the lead of humankind's worst enemy doctor Daimon.

But in your last mission after him, you were captured by his henchmen and now you must escape his last attempt of killing you in this house full of traps, but be warned that you don't have a lot of time.

So be fast, be smart, and try not to get yourself killed. Good luck agent.

This game was made in 48hrs as a prototype of an idea that I had recently and I may or may not go back to expand on this game.
